definitions.definition: The time ahead; those moments yet to be experienced.
Something that will happen in moments yet to come.
Goodness in what is yet to come. Something to look forward to.
definitions.example: There is no future in dwelling on the past.

definitions.definition: The likely prospects for or fate of someone or something in time to come.
(grammar) Verb tense used to talk about events that will happen in the future; future tense.
An object that retrieves the value of a promise.
Having to do with or occurring in the future.
definitions.example: Future generations will either laugh or cry at our stupidity.
